aboutSection.html:
I'm currently working as a Full Stack Software Engineer at Bonatra. I specialize in building web applications and software systems using JavaScript and Python
I graduated with a B.Tech in Information Technology from Manipal Institute of Technology
When I'm not coding, I like to play the keyboard, hit the gym or look for new ice-cream flavours

experiences.description: Currently working as a full stack software engineer creating systems for devices like the Bonatra X1 Smart Ring and experiences on the web and mobile app
experiences.skills: Python, JavaScript, React, React Native, Frappe, SQL, MongoDB

experiences.description: Worked as an intern where I came up with a new audit log API for the platform and helped integrate it while migrating old logs into the new format

projects.name: Expenses Manager
projects.description: Web app with authentication to manage individual daily and monthly expenses

projects.name: Playlist Converter
projects.description: CLI app that takes a .txt file and converts all songs in it to a Spotify Playlist
